amendment.description: To provide funding for interoperable communications equipment grants.

action.text: Amendment SA 1687 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1687.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1687 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 227.
Amendment SA 1687 ruled out of order by the chair.
